quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Meg Ryan and Angelina Jolie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, gia. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Angelina Jolie was 5 years old when her parents divorced.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which of these actors was originally offered the role of Detective John Kimble in the 1990 comedy Kindergarten Cop?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bill Murray

questions.question: As a child, Angelina Jolie wanted to become what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: funeral Director

questions.question: What is Meg Ryans full birth name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Margaret Mary Emily Hyra

questions.question: Meg Ryan was born on this date in Fairfield, Connecticut.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: November 19, 1961

questions.question: What is the name of the toy that Arnold Schwarzeneggers character is after in the 1996 comedy Jingle All the Way?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Turbo Man

questions.question: Arnold Schwarzenegger co-starred in Jingle All the Way with funnyman Eddie Murphy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Meg Ryan had a relationship followed by a marriage with actor Randy Quaid.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which of the following pairs of movies star both Meg Ryan and Tom Hanks?

options.text: Joe Versus the Volcano and Youve Got Mail
Joe Versus the Volcano and Courage Under Fire

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joe Versus the Volcano and Youve Got Mail

questions.question: Right after filming the movie Gia, Angelina Jolie quited acting for how long?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 6 months

questions.question: The letter H, tattooed on Angelina Jolies left wrist, stands for what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: both Haven and Hutton

questions.question: Jolie is actually Angelina Jolies middle name.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The 1996 film Jingle All the Way was based on the obsession with these toys in the 80s?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cabbage Patch Dolls

questions.question: Meg Ryan was in what daytime drama from 1982 to 1984?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: As the World Turns

questions.question: Arnold Schwarzenneger and Danny DeVito were originally offered to star in this 1991 film before starring in Twins.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Suburban Commando
